title: Be a hero
descHtml:
For my 2nd semester exam project, I worked along side two fellow students, on the website for ‘Be a hero’. A coaching company started in September 2021, by Benthe, with years of experience in the field.
She already has an established customer base, but needed a responsive website, that gives a quick overview of her, her business, and its services. Furthermore, she needed a logo, and a cover photo for her LinkedIn business page.

We came up with a simple design that is easy to navigate, it is build with HTML, CSS and Vanilla JS.
The logo is simple, and comes in multiple versions, for scalablility. To go with, I created what we refer to as a ‘cape’. The ‘cape’ is an organic, but clean-cut icon, inspired by a lavender flowerpetal, and a superhero cape.
short:
For my 2nd semester exam project, I worked along side two fellow students, on the website for ‘Be a hero’. A coaching company started in September 2021, by Benthe, with years of experience in the field.
She already has an established customer base, but needed a responsive website, that gives a quick overview of her, her business, and its services...

title: TaskRoomies
descHtml:
TaskRoomies is a web app for roommates, dorms and other cohabitants.
Its purpose is to provide a clear, easy overview of the shared household chores, and thus remove the stress and mental energy of keeping track of who does what when.
It also comes with a personal list, to keep track of all your personal to-do's and chores.

Try out the demo in the link above!
